1.0.name: wordpress/related-images
1.0.description:
Sometimes you dont want all images inside the post. Related images fix this and the current version let you add positions to the images, for example "Firstpage Top" or "Article Top".

Then you use a template tag to display the pictures on yor site.

The template tag looks like this: related_image('left_firstpage', '200', '200', 'image class'); You add the position, width, height and optional class to the image.

This can be usefull when you use WordPress as a cms and want to position images better then inside the posts
